channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: Product Search

item.title: FlexorCranks Short Sleeve Jersey
item.description:
Are you looking for a comfy, reliable, superior quality jersey at an economical price? Then the Seight Short Sleeve Jersey is what to go for. Made from pure 100% polyester, and designed with specially engineered quick drying micro fibres, it’s your optimum solution when it comes to wi..
